title: Is my AFDKO broken?
content: Sometimes when I run the Adobe auto-hinter Fontlab macros all of the curve points in my font become corner points. Is my install of the FDK screwed up, or is this a known problem? If so, do I work around it by copying the old outlines back into the font?
author: Dunwich Type

comments.content:
Hold the Ctrl key while you press the Play button for runnig the macro. You'll be presented with the dialog shown below. Make sure that the option "Allow changes to glyph outline" is unchecked.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110525074120im_/http:/typophile.com/files/autohint_5632.png)

If the issue persists send me some files and we'll look into it. Thanks.
